mapper.select: SELECT id AS id, resource_code AS resourceCode, store_path AS storePath, height AS height, width AS width, is_original_size AS isOriginalSize, description AS description, remark AS remark, disabled AS disabled, deleted AS deleted, module_code AS moduleCode, creator_user_code AS creatorUserCode, creator_username AS creatorUsername, create_time AS createTime, update_user_code AS updateUserCode, update_username AS updateUsername, update_time AS updateTime, ip AS ip, operator_longitude AS operatorLongitude, operator_latitude AS operatorLatitude, owner_user_code AS ownerUserCode, owner_org_code AS ownerOrgCode, owner_org_name AS ownerOrgName, synchronous_id AS synchronousId FROM waybill_thumbnail_resource_file WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO waybill_thumbnail_resource_file ( resource_code, store_path, height, width, is_original_size, description, remark, disabled, deleted, module_code, creator_user_code, creator_username, create_time, update_user_code, update_username, update_time, ip, operator_longitude, operator_latitude, owner_user_code, owner_org_code, owner_org_name, synchronous_id ) VALUES ( #{resourceCode}, #{storePath}, #{height}, #{width}, #{isOriginalSize}, #{description}, #{remark}, #{disabled}, #{deleted}, #{moduleCode}, #{creatorUserCode}, #{creatorUsername}, #{createTime}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateUsername}, #{updateTime}, #{ip}, #{operatorLongitude}, #{operatorLatitude}, #{ownerUserCode}, #{ownerOrgCode}, #{ownerOrgName}, #{synchronousId} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE waybill_thumbnail_resource_file
resource_code = #{resourceCode},
store_path = #{storePath},
height = #{height},
width = #{width},
is_original_size = #{isOriginalSize},
description = #{description},
remark = #{remark},
disabled = #{disabled},
deleted = #{deleted},
module_code = #{moduleCode},
creator_user_code = #{creatorUserCode},
creator_username = #{creatorUsername},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_user_code = #{updateUserCode},
update_username = #{updateUsername},
update_time = #{updateTime},
ip = #{ip},
operator_longitude = #{operatorLongitude},
operator_latitude = #{operatorLatitude},
owner_user_code = #{ownerUserCode},
owner_org_code = #{ownerOrgCode},
owner_org_name = #{ownerOrgName},
synchronous_id = #{synchronousId},
WHERE id = #{id}
